mapper.select: SELECT ID ,COMPANY_CODE ,AGENT_ID ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,CATEGORY ,CASE WHEN CATEGORY = 'E' THEN '긴급' WHEN CATEGORY = 'N' THEN '일반' WHEN CATEGORY = 'W' THEN '워닝' ELSE '일반' END AS CATEGORY_NAME ,DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_CONFIRM_COUNT ,DEPT_COUNT ,DEPT_CONFIRM_YN ,CREATED_DATETIME ,DATE_FORMAT(UPDATED_DATETIME, '%Y.%m.%d') AS CONVERSION_UPDATED_DATETIME FROM DP_ADV_ADMIN_NOTICE WHERE AGENT_ID = #{agentId} ORDER BY CREATED_DATETIME ASC
SELECT DISTINCT AGENT_ID FROM DP_ADV_AGENT WHERE IS_ADMIN = 'N' AND DEPT_CODE = (SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM DP_ADV_DEPT WHERE COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode} AND DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode})
SELECT DISTINCT AGENT_ID FROM DP_ADV_AGENT_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_COFIRM_YN = 'N' AND ADMIN_NOTICE_ID = {id}
